All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BasePage
Base page class for all page object classes.
CartAccessSteps
CartAccessSteps class contains step definitions for accessing the cart.
CartPage
CartPage class represents the cart page of the application.
CommonPage
CommonPage class represents the common elements on the application pages.
ConfigReader
ConfigReader class is responsible for reading configuration properties from a file.
ContactUsPage
ContactUsPage class represents the contact us page of the application.
DriverHelper
DriverHelper class to manage WebDriver instances.
HomePage
Page object class for the home page.
HomeSteps
HomeSteps class contains step definitions for the home page of the application.
LoginPage
Page object class for the login page.
LoginSteps
LoginSteps class contains step definitions for the login functionality of the application.
MyAccountPage
MyAccountPage class represents the "My Account" page of the application.
MyAccountSteps
MyAccountSteps class contains step definitions for the "My Account" page of the application.
NavbarPage
Page object class for the navigation bar.
RegisterPage
Page object class for the registration page.
RegisterSteps
RegisterSteps class contains step definitions for the registration functionality of the application.
SearchPage
SearchPage class represents the search page of the application.
SearchPresenceSteps
SearchPresenceSteps class contains step definitions for verifying the presence of search elements on the page.
SearchSteps
SearchSteps class contains step definitions for the search functionality of the application.
TestRunner
TestRunner class is the entry point for running Cucumber tests.
